nodes.text: Obohn Gallery of the Industrial Aesthetic
The Obohn Gallery of the Industrial Aesthetic was a collection of art, specializing in works of a metallic style. It had at least two curators, Dremullar Obohn di Garthos and "Father."

Marn Hierogryph and Zayne Carrick attempted to sell homemade scrap statuary to the gallery, claiming it to be the work of Ineas Tikartine. The pieces were refused at first, but Zayne used a mind trick to secure their purchase.
